item.title: BL-25 South at NM-118
item.description: BL-25 south at NM-118. Merge right for BL-25 to Truth or Consequences business district.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 26
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 26 - BL-40/NM-118/East Gallup. This is the eastern end of the Gallup business loop.

item.title: NM-118 West at NM-602/US-491
item.description: NM-118 west at Arnold St., to NM-602/Zuni/Ramah and US-491/Shiprock.

item.title: I-40 East Exit 26 offramp at NM-118
item.description: I-40 east Exit 26 offramp at NM-118/BL-40. NM-118 is the route of former US-66.

item.title: I-40 East Offramp at BL-40/NM-118
item.description: I-40 east offramp at BL-40/NM-118. Use NM-118 east for Army Depot. Rehoboth, and and Red Rock Park.

item.title: I-40 East at Exit 26 Offramp
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 26 Offramp. Turn right for State Police; turn left for Gallup and Hospital.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 26
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 26 - BL-40/NM-118/East Gallup. This is the eastern end of the Gallup business loop.

item.title: NM-118 East at I-40 East Onramp
item.description: NM-118 east at I-40 east onramp, at Exit 16. Use I-40 east for Albuquerque.

item.title: BL-40/NM-118 West at I-40 West
item.description: BL-40/NM-118 west at I-40 west to Flagstaff. This is the western end of the Gallup business loop.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 16
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 16 - BL-40/NM-118/West Gallup.

item.title: I-40 East Approaching Exit 16
item.description: I-40 east approaching Exit 16 - NM-118/BL-40/West Gallup. Use Exit 16 for BL-40/West Gallup/Historic US-66 Route.

item.title: I-40 East Approaching Exit 16
item.description: I-40 east approaching Exit 16 - BL-40/NM-118/West Gallup.

item.title: NM-118 East
item.description: NM-118 East in rural McKinley County.

item.title: NM-118 West at I-40 East
item.description: NM-118 west at I-40 east (Exit 8) onramp. Continue west on NM-118 for westbound I-40 access.

item.title: NM-118 West
item.description: NM-118 west shield, just west of I-40 (Exit 8) onramps. This sign is been spray painted, as has many other signs in the Gallup area.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 8
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 8. Eastbound, Exit 8 has no advanced signage, just the Exit 8 gore sign. Westbound, Exit 8 is signed as Manuelito/Defiance. Exit 8 is the first New Mexico exit eastbound on I-40. This exit connects to NM-118, which serves as a frontage road to I-40.
